扽字的基本解释

扽
dèn
拉；猛拉，使伸直或平整：把绳扽直。把衣服扽平。

扽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dèn］
［《廣韻》都困切，去慁，端。］
(1)用力猛地一拉；猛劲拉。
(2)摩。

扽字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扽； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页419第17
【唐韻】【集韻】?都困切，音頓。撼也。又【博雅】引也。一曰摩也。或作?。

暂无。

Shu
Basic explanation of words
Shu
dèn
To pull; yank, to straighten or level: Straighten the rope. Flatten the clothes.
Shu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dèn］
["Guangyun" are all sleepy and cut, go awkward, end. ]
(1) Pull vigorously; pull vigorously.
(2) Mo.
Shu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　扽; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 419 Page 17
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? All sleepy and cut, the sound is paused. Shake also. Also [Bo Ya] cited also. One said Moya. Or for?.
